div.div: According to a executive order from Governor Lamont, schools will not reopen until May 20 at the earliest. Please visit our E-Learning website at: https://sites.google.com/oxfordpublicschools.org/opsct-e-learning/

div.p: Please visit our distance learning website: https://sites.google.com/oxfordpublicschools.org/opsct-e-learning/ for related news, resources and support.

div.h5: Please click HERE to submit questions regarding the Oxford Board of Education 2020-2021 Budget

strong.style: box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 19.2px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; text-align: -webkit-center; background-color: rgba(225, 225, 225, 0.14902);
box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 19.2px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; text-align: -webkit-center; background-color: rgba(225, 225, 225, 0.14902);
strong.span: We embrace the future with dedication and commitment, working in partnership with our community to ensure student achievement through excellence in teaching and learning in a safe and secure environment. Our goal is to educate, prepare and inspire all students to reach their full potential as lifelong learners, responsible thinkers, and productive contributors to our global society.

h2.style: font-size: 20px; background: rgb(0, 28, 128); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-bottom: 5px solid rgb(0, 22, 103); width: 383.516px; margin: 0px auto 15px; text-align: center; padding: 13px; text-transform: uppercase; position: relative; z-index: 2;

div.style: align-items: center; background-color: transparent; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; justify-content: space-between; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; padding-left: 34px; padding-right: 34px; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 45.33px; max-width: 572px; min-width: 0px; text-align: center;

p.span: Oxford Public Schools is offering a Preschool Peer Model Program. This is an exciting educational opportunity for selected preschool children. The Preschool Program is located at Quaker Farms School and is looking for three and four year old children to participate in the preschool classroom as role models for their peers with special needs. In order to be considered, students must be three or four years old by August, 2020 and be an Oxford resident.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: "MS Sans Serif", serif;

p.span: Please see the "Response to SEEK Opinion Letter" under Central Office, Pupil Personnel Services on this site under Special Education Resources.
